name: GBSYS
description:
Global Business Systems (GBSYS) is focused on managing databases in ORACLE and SQL Server, as well as support in the maintenance and migration of applications on Oracle (Gold Partner), Java and .Net platforms.Â 
We distribute a complete line of software products, which are implemented directly by GBSYS or acquired by allied brands, recognized worldwide for their quality. We transmit knowledge from our Training Center or we adjust to their plans, giving workshops from their facilities or our allies' rooms.
